biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Franco Interlenghi (born 29 October 1931 at Rome) was an Italian actor.

He made his acting debut at 15 in Vittorio De Sica's Neorealist film Sciuscià.

He worked with great directors such as Federico Fellini in I Vitelloni, Michelangelo Antonioni in I Vinti and Luchino Visconti in his stage adaptation of Death of a Salesman.

He was maarried to Antonella Lualdi and had a daughter, Antonellina Interlenghi, who is an actress as well.
